welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Appleton, where the charm of an English village meets the liveliness of a bustling city. Known for its beautiful parks and historic architecture, we invite you to explore and embrace the unique character of our lovely town."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal at Chester Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
